_system_design.architecture: Single unified database containing all game items and weapons for consistent management
_system_design.source_filtering: Items specify availability via 'sources' array: store items use ['store'], slot machine items use ['slot_machine']
_system_design.uniqueness_system: stackable controls multiple copies, unique enforces once-per-run limitation for special items
_system_design.weapons: Two weapon types: Direct weapons (player fires) and Hangars (spawn AI ships)

weapons.name: Bullet Gun
weapons.description: Direct bullet weapon - you fire bullets

weapons.name: Bullet Hangar
weapons.description: Spawns AI ships that fire bullets for you

weapons.name: Laser Gun
weapons.description: Direct laser weapon - you fire chain lasers

weapons.name: Laser Hangar
weapons.description: Spawns AI ships that fire lasers for you

weapons.name: Rocket Launcher
weapons.description: Direct rocket weapon - you fire explosive rockets

weapons.name: Rocket Hangar
weapons.description: Spawns AI ships that fire rockets for you

weapons.name: Bio Gun
weapons.description: Direct bio weapon - you apply infection damage

weapons.name: Bio Hangar
weapons.description: Spawns AI ships that apply bio damage for you
